Object.Description: The Pathfinder is a balanced bowman who aims to cover all bases.

Ability1.Name: Anomalous Burst
Ability1.Description: Shoot a flurry of 6 (+1 per 30 SPD) heat seeking void blasts, dealing 75 (+75% STR) damage.

Ability2.Name: Paradoxical Shift
Ability2.Description: Become a Phantom for the next 3 seconds, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining +25% Speed.

Ability3.Name: Swarm
Ability3.Description: PASSIVE: Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a Soul Fragment for 5 seconds. ACTIVE: Convert all Soul Fragments within a 2 tile radius of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for 50 (+120% WIT) damage. Voidlings have 350 (+25% HP) Maximum Health, and lose 75 health every second. Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

UltimateAbility.Name: Anomalous Burst
UltimateAbility.Description: Gain control of the targeted Enemy for the next 10 seconds, making it unable to act on its own. During the possession, your body remains vulnerable to other enemies' attacks.

Object.Description: The Enigma is proficient with all styles but their base stats are low.

Ability1.Name: Anomalous Burst
Ability1.Description: Shoot a flurry of 6 (+1 per 30 SPD) heat seeking void blasts, dealing 750 (+75% STR) Physical Damage.

Ability2.Name: Paradoxical Shift
Ability2.Description: Become a Phantom for the next 3 seconds, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining +25% SPD.

Ability3.Name: Swarm
Ability3.Description: PASSIVE: Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a Soul Fragment for 5 seconds. ACTIVE: Convert all Soul Fragments within 2 tiles of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for 50 (+120% WIT) damage. Voidlings have 350 (+25% HP) Maximum Health, and lose 75 health every second. Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

UltimateAbility.Name: Possession
UltimateAbility.Description: Possess the targeted Enemy for the next 5 (+7% INT) seconds, making you control its movements and making it unable to shoot. During the possession, your body remains vulnerable to other enemies' attacks.
